unitobuy.title: What's Missing? You Buy
unitobuy.description: "You Buy" is every family's shopping assistant, making shopping easy and accurate. Upload photos, record voice notes, and sync lists effortlessly. Turn "panicked dads" into shopping experts and reliable partners.

islandVoice.title: Island Voice
islandVoice.description: Island Voice is dedicated to documenting the words, screenshots, and videos of Taiwanese public figures, creating a transparent and trustworthy archival platform.
